description: n! / number of prime divisors of n (with repetition).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=2,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=2,24,print(n!/bigomega(n)))(PARI) { f=1; for (n=2, 100, f*=n; write("b062349.txt", n, " ", f/bigomega(n)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 05 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 06 2001
